title: New free champion rotation: Cho'Gath, Malphite, Sona and more!

{{champion:107}}  <-- this guy died CodeZeroNine. We're, or more importantly, Riot is sorry for your lost.....I think.

Why does everyone say that he died? I literally bought Rengar before his rework, tried him, then tried him after his rework. He's still really strong, you just have to play him differently. If you guys would just ***learn to adapt instead of complaining,*** maybe you could learn that he's still really strong. Really, you just have to play him a bit differently now.
{{champion:121}} *Change, is goooooood*  {{champion:121}}
People are just struggling to adapt to his new 1v5 super tank playstyle with his new W, he is really strong in his own right

The problem is basically his playstyle goes against his theme.He's a hunter.A hunter selects and stalks a prey.He doesn't jump in a bunch of ppl like that.

The old one had this ability,observe,stalk,kill then go back to hiding
